ComicInfo.Title: Badlands
ComicInfo.Summary: Badlands: The vampire Luxura appears as bounty hunter in the Old West and searches for another vampire named Samuel. Luxura is arrested by the local sheriff, but is set free by his daughter Anne. Luxura and the sheriff face off for a duel at midnight and Luxura is shot down. The sheriff reveals himself to be Samuel in disguise. Luxura also has a trick up her sleeve as she has not been shot, but instead caught the bullet in her teeth. A further battle ensues as the western town burns down and Samuel is shot dead. Luxura rides away into the night.
